I can be a team player as well as working autonomic.

I am looking for a new challenge in my career.

profile_positions.description:
Functon:                                                         Procurement Account Manager 
Period:	 			September 1st, 2013 till September now
Company name: 			VDL-ETG Eindhoven 
Tasks and responsibilities: 
Purchasing responsibility for some Bill of Material (BOM) global supplier product groups such as wafer robotics, system assemblies and raw materials in relation to product family strategy creation, contracting and implementing.
Steering these global (meaning Netherlands, Singapore and China) and multi functional (meaning Quality Logistics Technology Cost) product family teams.
Other key responsibilities: 
1. Developing and implementing sourcing strategies for the strategic commodities.
2. Managing supplier relations on director and/or CEO level. 
3. Steer some strategic global product family teams and lead non-strategic commodity teams in line with business / customer objectives to ensure management satisfaction and customer satisfaction.
4. Involves selected suppliers in early stages of New Product Introduction process
5. Negotiate, implement and deploy global purchasing contracts/agreements
6. Drive cost price reduction and lead time reduction programs at suppliers
7. Monitor and report supplier developments / improvements in Quarterly Business Review meetings
8. Provide support in case of escalations and define plan to avoid escalations in the future.
9. Manage overall procurement processes and drives for continuous improvements
10. Built and sustain a global network with people in relevant related business areas to ensure knowledge transfer and sharing best practices.
11. Assures a timely balance between committed supply capacity and expected market requirements
12. Training and coaching new purchasing employees on strategic, tactical and operational purchase by a so called 4-BOX model. I have created this own purchasing course which is aligned with VDL-ETG’s business strategy.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Functon: 	Strategic Global Purchasing & New Business Development 
Centralized purchasing responsibility for Bill of Material (BOM) product groups such as components (OEM & Electronics) and raw materials in relation to commodity strategy creation, contracting and implementing on global scale for production facilities in the Netherlands, Singapore and China. 
Escalation of site exceeding supplier problems with global contract suppliers on CEO level is also part of my job description.
Create a VDL-ETG preferred supplier list per product group as outcome of commodity strategy development to be used for in house engineering department (from built to print to design to spec / farming out concept) 
Reducing number of customer pre-scribed supplier choices by proposing alternative suppliers from the VDL ETG preferred supplier list (outcome of commodity strategy) in a business case resulting in structural cost reductions.
Sales responsibilities for new business by means of partnership developments with strategic suppliers. It might be that some of our suppliers like to outsource mechanical work to VDL-ETG or that these suppliers are promoting VDL-ETG to some of their customers.
Jointly with sales key account managers to negotiate sales contracts (LTSA's) to achieve back to back coverage. 
Setting up global executive meetings with most important contract suppliers.
Training and coaching of the six local purchasing groups. I have created own purchasing course which is aligned with VDL-ETG’s business strategy.
Responsible for creating, maintaining and aligning of purchasing procedures for the various purchasing sites. This includes making of purchasing contract templates on global scale. I also travel 5 times per year to China, 4 times to Singapore for local support and coaching and one time to US bay area for Semicon West exhibition.
